reviewText: Its a simple fun match the colors" style puzzle game with a cute (cute is the only word I could think of) little story. Good for a time killer and seems like it would run on a low-end pc. $6.99 seems a little pricey so I would wait for a sale."
voteText: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Too pricey for a simple match game. There's just not enough to keep my attention. It just makes me want to play Bejeweled some more.
